ygData.subject: Re: Baby/Flicker and Condor

 Ultra Magnus walked in a sat down. He rubbed his hands togeather and was 
obviously nervous. 'I do not know what to do. Half of my spark is still 
missing, The Tripred ship disappeared without a trace into an anamoly in 
space. I know that part of my spark is still out there though the general is 
gone. I am afraid who ever gets a hold of it may try and take control of me 
again."
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : : 
> Rodimus Prime: Yeah, I'll go see what he needed to talk about. You try to get 
> some sleep. 
> Rodimus gets up and walks out of the bedroom portion of their quarters, and to 
> the door. He presses the button opening it. He then motions Ultra Magnus in, as 
> he sits on the couch. 
> Rodimus Prime: It's good to see you. What did you need to talk about, old 
> friend? 
>  "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote: Nightlight:
> 
> Nighlight huged him with one arm while with the other she hold the 
> baby, and kissed Roddy cheek. 
> 
> "Magnus in outside"sadi sofltly the femme 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Rodimus sirs on the edge of the bed, and hugs Nightlight tight.
> > Rodimus Prime: This war is a dark place in all our sparks. But, 
> now there is a light in my spark. You, the baby, and the life we 
> will have together.
> > He kissed her forehead.
> >  "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" <airly2002@h...> 
> wrote:Nightlight/Baby:
> > 
> > Nightlight smiled and said "Do you know something, my love? In 
> first 
> > battle, before I met you I felt unhappy 'cause I dislike this war, 
> > almost I wished that my pod never had been discovered, but now... 
> > It's diferent... If my neve had been discovered, I never would 
> meet 
> > you.. Now in spite of this war, I'm happy to be in your side..."
> >

> >

> sounds... 
> > One was mommy and the other? Mommy didn't seemed to scared, then 
> she 
> > knew what was that noise, razoned her youth mind. Baby didn't was 
> > worried and yawed and fell sleep in  his mommy arms
> >

> > >

> talk

> > > > Rodimus turns to see that Nightlight was trying to get up but 
> was 
> > still too 
> > > > weak. He picks her up into his arms, along with the baby.

> need

> > > > baby will need an Ionic shower(I'm stealing things from Star 
> Trek 
> > again). 
> > > > Rodimus walks out of the Sick Bay, holding his family, and 
> heads 
> > for his 
> > > > quarters. 
> > > > A lot was on his mind right now. So much had happened 
> recently. 
> > His falling in 
> > > > love with Nightlight, the birth of their daughter, it was all 
> > good. He had a 
> > > > family. However he was still the General Commander of a 
> Maximal 
> > force in the 
> > > > middle of the Neo Beast Wars. Not to mention that he was the 
> > Matrix's "Chosen 
> > > > One," Rodimus Prime. That meant that no telling how many past 
> > Decepticons and 
> > > > Predacons wanted him dead. Life was complicated....

> > > >
